Edit Menu

Choose Edit - Undo

CommandCtrl+Z

On the Standard Bar or Table Data bar, click

Undo

Choose Edit - Redo

On the Standard Bar, click

Redo

Choose Edit - Repeat

Choose Edit - Cut

CommandCtrl+X

On the Standard Bar, click

Cut

Choose Edit - Copy

CommandCtrl+C

On the Standard Bar, click

Copy

Choose Edit - Paste

CommandCtrl+V

On the Standard Bar, click

Paste

Choose Edit - Paste Special

Choose Edit - Select All

CommandCtrl+A

Select All

Choose Edit - Track Changes

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Record

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Show Choose Edit - Track Changes - Show

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Manage

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Manage - List tab

Choose Tools - AutoCorrect - Apply and Edit Changes. The AutoCorrect dialog appears. Click the Edit Changes button and navigate to the List tab.

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Manage - Filter tab

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Merge Document

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Compare Document

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Comment

Choose Edit - Track Changes - Manage - List tab. Click an entry in the list and open the context menu. Choose Edit Comment

Choose Edit - Find

CommandCtrl+F

Choose Edit - Find & Replace

CommandCtrl+H

On Standard bar, click

Find & Replace

Choose Edit - Find & Replace - Attributes

Choose Edit - Find & Replace - Format button

Choose Edit - Find & Replace - Similarity search check box and Similarities button.

On the Table Data Bar, click Find icon - Similarity search check box - Similarities button (database table view)

On Form Design Bar, click Record Search - Similarity search check box - Similarities button (form view)

Choose View - Navigator

On Standard Bar, click

Navigator On/Off

Choose Tools - Bibliography Database

Choose Edit - Links

Choose Edit - Links - Modify Link (DDE links only)

Select a frame, then choose Edit - Object - Properties

Open context menu of selected frame - choose Properties

Choose Edit - ImageMap (also in context menu of selected object)

Choose Edit - ImageMap, then select a section of the ImageMap and click Properties - Description

Choose Edit - Object

Choose Edit - Object - Edit, also in the context menu of selected object

Choose Edit - Object - Open
